meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Carvaines Joan Kossack Rebecca Rider Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6575.

td.p: Michael Carvaines, an independent filmmaker originally from Parma, Ohio
Joan Kossack, a pre-K teacher from Carol Stream, Illinois
Rebecca Rider, an office supply sales assistant from Fresh Meadows, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,600)

tr.td: LOGOMANIA
WORLD CITIES
(Alex: We want the traditional English name in...)
CONSTELLATION TRANSLATION
"BLACK" OR "WHITE"
A PERSON, PLACE & THING
(Alex: A person, place, or thing, you tell us.)
IN A MUSICAL MOOD

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
